title: Price of good decreases, MRP decreases

content.question: Which of the following will happen in the labor market if the price of the good produced by the workers decreases?

choices.label: The marginal product of labor will increase.
The marginal product of labor will decrease.
The marginal revenue product of labor will increase.
The marginal revenue product of labor will decrease.
The demand curve for labor will shift to the right.

content.answer: The marginal revenue product of labor will decrease.

topic.text: 5.2: Changes in Factor Demand and Factor Supply

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Determine the effect(s) of one or more changes on other economic markets.
